PRIVACY.title: Privacy policy
PRIVACY.personal-data-content:
Histamine Tracker does not collect any personal data. No personal data is needed for the app to work. If no personal data is collected, no data can be stolen, leaked or abused.
    This is the best way to protect the privacy of the app user.
PRIVACY.app-permissions-content:
For the app to function properly a couple of permissions are needed:

  • Internet permission - to be able to access the OpenFoodFacts database for the ingredients of scanned products.
  • Camera permission - to be able to use the device camera for the barcode scans.

These permissions can be limited to app runtime and are only used for the described purpose.
PRIVACY.cookies-content: Histamine Tracker does not use any tracking or identifying cookies.
PRIVACY.other-policies-content: The Histamine Tracker app contains links to other websites. This privacy policy applies only to Histamine Tracker application, so if you click on a link to another website, you should read their privacy policy.
PRIVACY.changes-content: Histamine Tracker keeps its privacy policy under regular review and places any updates on this page. This privacy policy was last updated on 23 June 2022.
PRIVACY.contact-content: If you have any questions about Histamine Tracker’s privacy policy, please do not hesitate to contact me.
PRIVACY.contact-form-no-client: No email client was found on this device.
PRIVACY.contact-form-validation-subject-pattern: Subject can contain only letters, whitespace and numbers.
PRIVACY.contact-authority: How to contact the appropriate authority
PRIVACY.contact-authority-content: Should you wish to report a complaint or if you feel that Histamine Tracker has not addressed your concern in a satisfactory manner, you may contact the Information Commissioner’s Office.
